channel.title: Duel Arena
channel.description:
Hello,
I am currently using Luckscape PI source.
When in duel arena, after you kill someone, you stay in the arena.
The only way to get out, is to logout.
When you logout, the other person recieves the stakes.
How can I fix this? REP ++ as always

item.title: Duel Arena
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Unfortunately its PI

but i would look
in PlayerAssistant.java

			if(o != null) {
				if(!(c.npcIndex > 0) && c.inPits == false){
				}
				if (c.killerId != c.playerId)
					o.sendMessage("You have defeated "+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+"!");
					c.playerKilled = c.playerId;
				if(!PlayerKilling.hostOnList(o, c.connectedFrom)) {
					PlayerKilling.addHostToList(o, c.connectedFrom);
					o.pkPoints++;
					o.sendMessage("You have received a point, you now have "+o.pkPoints+" pk points.");
					} else {
					o.sendMessage("You have recently defeated "+c.playerName+", you don't receive any pk points.");
					}
				if(o.duelStatus == 5) {
					o.duelStatus++;
				}
			}

Look for where you win then add a teleport out.

Read full topic

item.title: Duel Arena
item.dc:creator: @Sun_Chips Sun Chips
item.description:
@Sun_Chips wrote:

[center]Dont spam a thread just so you can tell someone they can’t rep its pointless.

@OP: In order to do this your going to need to know some actual Java, so what you want to do is find the 2 variables that are storing you and your opponent once your in a duel(I dont know them as I can’t stand to work on servers) now you need to configure it so that if person 1 kills person 2 or person 2 kills person 1 there both teleported out, most likely however since you said

When you logout, the other person recieves the stakes.
then the method for teleporting the two people out and giving the stake has already been written on your server and is probably sitting somewhere in your “logout” method so all you would have to do is very little.
[/center]

Read full topic

Hello,

I am currently using Luckscape PI source.

When in duel arena, after you kill someone, you stay in the arena.

The only way to get out, is to logout.

When you logout, the other person recieves the stakes.

How can I fix this? REP ++ as always
[/quote]U can’t rep++ =o[/quote]
Neither can you? Why do you keep posting that on threads? Besides, half of the 10 rep kids that join don’t understand that you need 15 rep to rep++.
